alert.note: Alert for Lenawee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 5:32PM EDT until June 25 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM EDT FOR LENAWEE COUNTY... At 532 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tecumseh, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Tecumseh and Britton around 540 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Seneca, Manitou Beach-Devils Lake, Macon, Ogden Center, Canandaigua, Ridgeway, Palmyra, Tipton, Sand Creek and Jasper. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for southeastern Michigan. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
